definitions.definition: A person born to a legally married couple.
To make legitimate, lawful, or valid; especially, to put in the position or state of a legitimate person before the law, by legal means.
In accordance with the law or established legal forms and requirements.
Conforming to known principles, or established or accepted rules or standards; valid.
definitions.example: legitimate reasoning; a legitimate standard or method
legitimate poems of Chaucer; legitimate inscriptions

definitions.definition: Lawfully begotten, i.e., born to a legally married couple.
